experience.heading: Found family away from home
experience.description: When I came to the US, I left my family in India. Though I was sad leaving them behind, I didn't know that I would find a family away from home. I had to travel to Dallas all the way from Boston though. It was forth the effort. I got so much love and care in Dallas.

experience.heading: Another family found away from home
experience.description: Semester is over. I am going to North Carolina to meet my family. When I came to the US, I left my family in India. Though I was sad leaving them behind, I didn't know that I would find another family away from home. I had to travel to North Carolina this time all the way from Boston. It was forth the effort. I got so much love and care in North Carolina.
